name: Aliens
author: Limitless95
notes:
Similar to other builds. I could've made it to KoG with 25 wins instead of 41 but lost 3 KoG promotions. 2 were against stall burn and 1 backrow-hate dinosaurs.

The best part about the deck was when I stole saffira by brainwash and used its effect (did it many times during my climb). Also, i'd like to thank WoD for making people surrender.
